channel.title: Found a way for player owned houses
channel.description:
Ok this only works with -fedexer's- building tut. I thought we could change the objects is the void to make a new viod of player owned houses. It would have 4 levels, I thought:
1 - Non-mods
2 - Mods 3 - Admins 4 - Owner
We could make the object for it to be a cool house but theres 1 problem are the objects of player owned houses form rs in moparscape 3.1?

item.title: Found a way for player owned houses
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I think the house owner doesn’t have a special kind of user right, I think there is a parameter in the file of the house itself that specifies who owns it, and when somebody in the house tries to expell guests or go in building mode, it first checks that they own it. Can you post a link to fedexers tut? I really wanna look at it. I dont think the objects are in mopar yet though, seeing as theres no house portal in rimmington.

Read full topic
item.source: Found a way for player owned houses

item.title: Found a way for player owned houses
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

[quote=“samuraiblood2, post:5, topic:19669”][quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=29860.msg343665#msg343665 date=1161652748]
Well, my best guess is it would be some kind of array. From what I know, information about houses is stored in an entirely different file from the game engine AND the owners profile, because there would be no way to set up coordinates for somebody in a house, with out expanding the landscape cache for each new house set up, a.k.a filling the game with laggy crap.
[/quote]i can see this work but u have a point[/quote]

C’mon its gotta be possible somehow at least 20%…Something.

Read full topic

item.title: Found a way for player owned houses
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

I know! Ill make 4 Voids 1 for non-mods owners, Ect. ANd ill also make 4 commands with player rights. And then they can constuct whatever they want there. I wouls also need a command to teleport to house. And house optons menu… Hmm Ill make it a command a new menu.
For kicking players out of the house. I would make a command that when you IN the house you can kick the quest which would be like a command if you type ::expel it would teleport EVERYONE in your house to designated coordinates.

I already have contsruction skill but I need the player house void.

Im not worried about PvP

Ill take the wildy off it for it to handle Teleports.

Read full topic
item.source: Found a way for player owned houses

item.title: Found a way for player owned houses
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I think you’d have to actually write code for the houses; something that:

Checks you have the right levels,
Checks you have the materials,
Gives you proper options on what you can build depending on what you’ve already got,
Sets up pvp correctly to avoid more 666 massacres,
Handles teleports,
Etc.

Jagex took 5 years to make POH, and they had to upgrade their game engine. Twice.
And the houses suck nonetheless.
Although, wheres fedexers tut? I wanna go see it before I say something else stupid.

Read full topic
item.source: Found a way for player owned houses
